rooms.description: Spacious living room with Mediterranean style decor and large windows facing the garden
Open dining area adjacent to kitchen and living space
Modern kitchen designed with Vastu principles for energy flow, includes storage and breakfast nook
Connects entrance to living areas; includes family room space
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and private balcony offering garden view
Secondary bedroom designed for guest use
Dedicated study or home office space
Shared bathroom on the first floor
Fourth bedroom with storage and closet space
Additional bathroom for the extra bedroom
